data.text: Kane Jona ne ni ei rech, nolamo Jehova Nyasaye.
Pi mane olwora nobwoga kendo kude mag nam
Nalutora nyaka e tiend gode mag nam
“Ka chunya ne dwaro aa ne apari Jehova Nyasaye,
An to napaki kod wend goyo erokamano
Kendo Jehova Nyasaye nowuoyo gi rech mi rechno nongʼogo Jona oko e dho wath kama otwo.
